title: Best apples to eat? Healthiest types from green to red and everything in between
titleCN: 吃哪种苹果最好？从青到红，各种颜色中最健康的品种

paragraphs.original: Apples are a *classic*(经典的) fruit choice. They're the *unofficial mascot*(非官方吉祥物) of lunchbox side dishes and they make a delicious afternoon snack when *dipped in*(蘸上) peanut butter. They're even available at McDonald's as a healthy Happy Meal side.
paragraphs.translation: 苹果是一种经典的水果选择。它们是午餐盒配菜的“非官方吉祥物”，蘸上花生酱后更是美味的下午茶点。你甚至可以在麦当劳买到它们，作为开心乐园餐的健康配菜。

paragraphs.original: It's no surprise then that the U.S is one of the world's largest apple *producer*(生产国), second only to China. We produce an average of 240 million *bushels*(蒲式耳) of apples every year, according to the U.S. Apple Association.
paragraphs.translation: 因此，美国是世界上最大的苹果生产国之一，仅次于中国，也就不足为奇了。根据美国苹果协会的数据，我们平均每年生产2.4亿蒲式耳的苹果。

paragraphs.original: But with so many *varieties*(品种) to choose from, is there one that *reigns supreme*(占据主导地位)? Here's what we found out about the *nutritional profiles*(营养成分) of the different kinds of apples.
paragraphs.translation: 但是，面对如此多可供选择的品种，是否有一种是“王者”呢？以下是我们对不同种类苹果营养成分的调查结果。

paragraphs.original: What is the healthiest apple?
paragraphs.translation: 哪种苹果最健康？

paragraphs.original: Whether it's *Granny Smith*(澳洲青苹), *Golden Delicious*(金帅), *Honeycrisp*(蜜脆) or *Gala*(嘎啦果); any type of apple is going to benefit your health. Only 12.3% of *American*(美国) adults meet their fruit intake *recommendations*(建议), the Center for Disease Control and Prevention found. The more apples in your diet, the better, says registered *dietitian*(营养师) Danielle Crumble Smith, regardless of the type. Some, however have unique health benefits.
paragraphs.translation: 无论是澳洲青苹（Granny Smith）、金帅（Golden Delicious）、蜜脆（Honeycrisp）还是嘎啦果（Gala），任何种类的苹果都对你的健康有益。美国疾病控制与预防中心发现，只有12.3%的美国成年人达到了建议的水果摄入量。注册营养师丹妮尔·克伦布尔·史密斯（Danielle Crumble Smith）表示，无论哪种类型，饮食中的苹果越多越好。不过，有些品种确实具有独特的健康益处。

paragraphs.original: *Red Delicious*(红蛇果) apples are the healthiest from an *antioxidant*(抗氧化剂) standpoint, Crumble Smith says. The darker the color of the apple, the richer it'll be in antioxidants. Antioxidants help *neutralize*(中和) the *free radicals*(自由基) in our bodies which, when imbalanced, can cause cell damage and lead to disease.
paragraphs.translation: 克伦布尔·史密斯说，从抗氧化剂的角度来看，红蛇果（Red Delicious）是最健康的。苹果的颜色越深，其抗氧化剂含量就越丰富。抗氧化剂有助于中和我们体内的自由基，当自由基失衡时，会导致细胞损伤并引发疾病。

paragraphs.original: Aiming for different types of deep colors can help you ensure you're getting *variety*(多种) of different types of antioxidants, she says.
paragraphs.translation: 她说，目标是不同种类的深色苹果，可以帮助你确保摄入多种不同类型的抗氧化剂。

paragraphs.original: If you're looking to increase your *vitamin C*(维生素C) intake, try a *Pink Lady*(粉红佳人) or *McIntosh*(麦金托什) apple, Crumble Smith says, If *fiber*(纤维) is what your seek, go for a Honeycrisp or Granny Smith.
paragraphs.translation: 克伦布尔·史密斯说，如果你想增加维生素C的摄入量，可以尝试粉红佳人（Pink Lady）或麦金托什（McIntosh）苹果；如果你寻求的是纤维，那就选择蜜脆（Honeycrisp）或澳洲青苹（Granny Smith）。

paragraphs.original: *Across the board*(全面地) with apples one thing's for sure, Crumble Smith, eat them *raw*(生吃) and *unpeeled*(不削皮).
paragraphs.translation: 关于苹果，有一件事是肯定的，克伦布尔·史密斯说：要生吃，而且不要削皮。

paragraphs.original: Eating the skin ensures that you're really going to eat all of that fiber, get all of those antioxidants because the skin is where a lot of it is, Crumble Smith says. The vitamin C content can also decrease during the *cooking process*(烹饪过程) because vitamin C is *soluble in water*(溶于水) and sensitive to temperature.
paragraphs.translation: 克伦布尔·史密斯说，吃果皮可以确保你摄入全部的纤维和所有的抗氧化剂，因为果皮中含有大量的这些成分。此外，在烹饪过程中，维生素C的含量也会下降，因为维生素C溶于水且对温度敏感。

paragraphs.original: Are apples healthy?
paragraphs.translation: 苹果健康吗？

paragraphs.original: Yes - apples are *packed with*(富含) vitamins and minerals and are an important part of a healthy diet, just like other fruits. They're a good source of fiber and contain *pectin*(果胶), a fiber that acts as a *prebiotic*(益生元) to aid *colon function*(结肠功能) and *digestion*(消化).
paragraphs.translation: 是的——苹果富含维生素和矿物质，就像其他水果一样，是健康饮食的重要组成部分。它们是良好的纤维来源，并含有果胶，这种纤维作为一种益生元，有助于结肠功能和消化。

paragraphs.original: Apples are high in vitamin C, which has antioxidant properties to help us absorb and store *iron*(铁), maintain *strong tissues*(强壮的组织), *boost our immune system*(增强免疫系统) and produce more *collagen*(胶原蛋白) for hair, skin and nail health.
paragraphs.translation: 苹果富含维生素C，维生素C具有抗氧化特性，有助于我们吸收和储存铁，维持强壮的组织，增强免疫系统，并产生更多胶原蛋白，促进头发、皮肤和指甲的健康。

paragraphs.original: Apples also contain *quercetin*(槲皮素), a *flavonoid*(类黄酮) with antioxidant properties that studies show may reduce the risk of *cardiovascular disease*(心血管疾病) and protect against allergies because it acts as a natural *antihistamine*(抗组胺药).
paragraphs.translation: 苹果还含有槲皮素（quercetin），这是一种具有抗氧化特性的类黄酮。研究表明，它可能降低心血管疾病的风险，并预防过敏，因为它起到了天然抗组胺药的作用。

paragraphs.original: *Apple cider vinegar*(苹果醋), a *fermented solution*(发酵溶液) made from pressed apples, also has numerous health benefits including weight loss and *cholesterol management*(胆固醇管理).
paragraphs.translation: 苹果醋是一种由压榨苹果制成的发酵溶液，也具有许多健康益处，包括减肥和胆固醇管理。

paragraphs.original: Apples are listed on the *Dirty Dozen list*(“脏十二种”名单), or the *Environmental Working Group's*(环境工作组) analysis of the 12 vegetables with the highest traces of *pesticides*(农药).
paragraphs.translation: 苹果被列入了“脏十二种”名单（Dirty Dozen list），即环境工作组（Environmental Working Group）分析出的农药残留量最高的12种蔬菜（和水果）之一。

paragraphs.original: This doesn't means you shouldn't eat them. Crumble Smith says. Buying *organic*(有机的) is one option if you're eating apples daily. Still, organic produce is not completely *pesticide-free*(无农药) because farmers often use naturally-derived pesticides derived. Research published in the Journal of Toxicology found the pesticides in the produce on the Dirty Dozen list are at *negligible levels*(可忽略不计的水平) and substituting organic didn't result in significant risk reduction.
paragraphs.translation: 克伦布尔·史密斯说，这并不意味着你不应该吃它们。如果你每天都吃苹果，购买有机苹果是一个选择。不过，有机农产品并非完全没有农药，因为农民经常使用天然衍生的农药。发表在《毒理学杂志》（Journal of Toxicology）上的研究发现，“脏十二种”名单上农产品中的农药含量可以忽略不计，用有机产品替代并不会显著降低风险。

title: China's BYD overtakes Tesla's electric car sales in the last quarter of 2023
titleCN: 中国比亚迪在2023年第四季度的电动汽车销量超过特斯拉

paragraphs.original: Chinese company BYD sold more *electric vehicles*(电动汽车) than Elon Musk's Tesla in the last three months of 2023 as the two battled for *top spot*(头把交椅) in the sector.
paragraphs.translation: 2023年最后三个月，中国企业比亚迪售出的电动汽车数量超过了埃隆·马斯克旗下的特斯拉，两家公司正在争夺该领域的头把交椅。

paragraphs.original: BYD said on Monday it had sold a *record*(创纪录) 526,000 *battery-only vehicles*(纯电动汽车) in the final quarter of 2023.
paragraphs.translation: 比亚迪周一表示，其在2023年第四季度售出了创纪录的52.6万辆纯电动汽车。

paragraphs.original: It marked the first quarter its battery-only sales have *outpaced*(超过) Tesla's. The US-based firm has seen *demand slow*(需求放缓) as *borrowing costs*(借贷成本) climb.
paragraphs.translation: 这是比亚迪纯电动汽车销量首次在单季度超过特斯拉。随着借贷成本上升，这家美国企业的需求出现放缓。

paragraphs.original: However, for the *whole of 2023*(2023年全年), Mr Musk's Tesla still sold more.
paragraphs.translation: 不过，就2023年全年而言，马斯克的特斯拉销量仍更高。

paragraphs.original: On Tuesday, Tesla said it *delivered*(交付) a record 484,500 electric vehicles in the last three months of 2023 and 1.8 million for the year as a whole.
paragraphs.translation: 特斯拉周二称，其2023年最后三个月交付了创纪录的48.45万辆电动汽车，全年交付量达180万辆。

paragraphs.original: The *end-of-year performance*(年终表现) was better than analysts had expected, as sales rose 20% from the same period in 2022 and *picked up pace*(提速) from earlier in 2023. Analyst Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities described the quarter as a "*clear win*(明确的胜利)" for Tesla.
paragraphs.translation: 年终表现好于分析师预期：销量较2022年同期增长20%，且较2023年初有所提速。韦德布什证券公司分析师丹·艾夫斯称，该季度对特斯拉而言是“明确的胜利”。

paragraphs.original: But it *fell short of*(未达到) earlier hopes. Last January, Mr Musk said that Tesla had the *potential*(潜力) to achieve two million deliveries in 2023.
paragraphs.translation: 但这仍未达到此前的预期。去年1月，马斯克曾表示，特斯拉2023年有望实现200万辆的交付量。

paragraphs.original: The firm *cut prices repeatedly*(多次降价) to try to *woo buyers*(吸引消费者).
paragraphs.translation: 该公司多次降价以吸引消费者。

paragraphs.original: "As BYD has *accelerated into the fast lane*(驶入快车道), it's fresh evidence of just how *competitive*(竞争激烈) the EV market has become and how hard it will be for Tesla to *swerve back to head the pack*(重新领跑)," said Susannah Streeter, head of *money and markets*(货币与市场) at Hargreaves Lansdown.
paragraphs.translation: “随着比亚迪驶入快车道，这再次证明电动汽车市场的竞争已变得多么激烈，而特斯拉要重新领跑将多么困难，”哈格里夫斯·兰斯当公司货币与市场部门负责人苏珊娜·斯特里特表示。

paragraphs.original: For the year as a whole, *Shenzhen-based*(总部位于深圳的) BYD sold more than 3 million *so-called-new energy vehicles*(所谓的新能源汽车) (NEVs), which includes battery-only vehicles and *hybrids*(混合动力汽车).
paragraphs.translation: 就全年而言，总部位于深圳的比亚迪售出了超300万辆所谓的新能源汽车（包括纯电动汽车和混合动力汽车）。

paragraphs.original: Almost 1.6 million of its total sales were battery-only vehicles, the firm said.
paragraphs.translation: 该公司称，其总销量中近160万辆是纯电动汽车。

paragraphs.original: BYD's *chief executive*(首席执行官) Wang Chuanfu *co-founded*(共同创立) BYD with his cousin in Shenzhen in 1995.
paragraphs.translation: 比亚迪首席执行官王传福于1995年与表兄在深圳共同创立了比亚迪。

paragraphs.original: The company *made a name for itself*(崭露头角) as a manufacturer of *rechargeable batteries*(可充电电池) - used in *smartphones*(智能手机), *laptops*(笔记本电脑) and other *electronics*(电子产品) - that competed with *pricier Japanese imports*(价格更高的日本进口产品).
paragraphs.translation: 该公司最初以可充电电池制造商的身份崭露头角（其电池用于智能手机、笔记本电脑等电子产品），与价格更高的日本进口电池展开竞争。

paragraphs.original: It started selling its *shares on the stock market*(在股市上市) in 2002 and *diversified*(实现业务多元化) by purchasing a *struggling state-owned car manufacturer*(陷入困境的国有汽车制造商), Qinchuan Automobile Company.
paragraphs.translation: 比亚迪于2002年开始在股市上市，并通过收购陷入困境的国有汽车制造商秦川汽车公司实现业务多元化。

paragraphs.original: Since 2008 BYD has counted *veteran US investor*(美国资深投资者) Warren Buffett's *Berkshire Hathaway*(伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司) as a shareholder.
paragraphs.translation: 自2008年起，比亚迪就将美国资深投资者沃伦·巴菲特旗下的伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司列为股东。

paragraphs.original: Analysts say BYD *owes its growth to*(增长得益于) its original business - batteries. They are among the most expensive parts of an EV and making them *in-house*(自研) saves BYD a lot of money.
paragraphs.translation: 分析师表示，比亚迪的增长得益于其原本的电池业务。电池是电动汽车成本最高的部件之一，自研电池为比亚迪节省了大量成本。

paragraphs.original: Many of BYD's *competitors*(竞争对手) rely on *third-party manufacturers*(第三方制造商) for batteries.
paragraphs.translation: 比亚迪的许多竞争对手依赖第三方制造商供应电池。

paragraphs.original: BYD's battery business helped to give it *flexibility*(灵活性) to cut prices sharply at the end of 2023, *lifting sales*(拉动销量), which jumped by 70% in December alone.
paragraphs.translation: 比亚迪的电池业务使其在2023年底具备大幅降价的灵活性，从而拉动了销量——仅12月销量就激增了70%。

title: The breakthrough in augmented and virtual reality - Apple Vision Pro
titleCN: 增强现实与虚拟现实的突破 - Apple Vision Pro

paragraphs.original: The Launch of the Apple Vision Pro marks a significant step in the development of *augmented and virtual reality*(增强现实与虚拟现实). *With a focus*(专注于) on high-quality technology, innovative features and a higher price point, Apple *is aiming to*(旨在) transform the way we perceive reality. The coming months will show how consumers will react to this *ground-breaking*(突破性的) AR and VR headset.
paragraphs.translation: Apple Vision Pro的发布标志着增强现实与虚拟现实发展的重要一步。苹果专注于高品质技术、创新功能和更高的价格定位，旨在改变我们感知现实的方式。未来几个月将展示消费者对这款突破性AR和VR头显的反应。

paragraphs.original: The Apple Vision Pro impresses with a lightweight, *ergonomic*(人体工程学) design and advanced technologies, including an unspecified M2 chip and a dedicated R1 chip. The transparent display on the body provides a unique *visualisation*(可视化) and underlines Apple's focus on innovation.
paragraphs.translation: Apple Vision Pro以其轻量级、人体工程学设计和先进技术给人留下深刻印象，包括未具体说明的M2芯片和专用R1芯片。机身上的透明显示屏提供了独特的可视化效果，凸显了苹果对创新的关注。

paragraphs.original: The new flagship, *state-of-the-art*(最先进的) AR and VR glasses, will be launched in the US in early February. With a price tag of around $3,500 and an impressive range of features, including the *seamless integration*(无缝集成) of digital content into the real-world environment, it promises to *revolutionise*(彻底改变) the way we experience augmented and virtual reality.
paragraphs.translation: 这款全新的旗舰级、最先进的AR和VR眼镜将于2月初在美国推出。它售价约为3,500美元，拥有令人印象深刻的功能，包括将数字内容无缝集成到现实环境中，有望彻底改变我们体验增强现实和虚拟现实的方式。

paragraphs.original: Officially *unveiled*(发布) at WWDC in June 2023, Apple has now announced that *pre-orders*(预购) will start on 19 January, followed by the launch in the US on 2 February. The US price is around 3,500 dollars. Information on availability in Europe and the corresponding prices remain open for the time being.
paragraphs.translation: Apple Vision Pro于2023年6月在WWDC上正式发布，苹果现在宣布预购将于1月19日开始，随后于2月2日在美国推出。美国售价约为3,500美元。目前关于在欧洲的可用性和相应价格的信息尚未确定。

paragraphs.original: At a time when Meta is *dominating*(主导) the VR market with the *Quest*(Quest) 3 model, Apple positioning itself with a higher price for high-end AR and VR. The Apple glasses outperform the competition by integrating digital content into the real-world environment and offering enhanced applications such as improved *Facetime*(FaceTime) video calling and TV usage without the need for a physical screen - all without the need for any other Apple devices.
paragraphs.translation: 在Meta凭借Quest 3型号主导VR市场的同时，苹果以更高的价格定位高端AR和VR产品。Apple Vision Pro通过将数字内容集成到现实环境中，并提供增强的应用程序（如改进的FaceTime视频通话和无需物理屏幕的电视使用），超越了竞争对手 - 所有这些都不需要任何其他苹果设备。

paragraphs.original: The Apple Vision Pro does not require any other device from the Apple *ecosystem*(生态系统), although it can work with the iPhone and Mac. Apple is planning accessories, including *optical inserts*(光学镜片) from ZEISS and a modular extension for sensors or cameras. A separate box could turn any surface into a virtual *trackpad*(触控板).
paragraphs.translation: Apple Vision Pro不需要任何其他苹果生态系统设备，尽管它可以与iPhone和Mac配合使用。苹果正在计划配件，包括蔡司的光学镜片和用于传感器或摄像头的模块化扩展。一个单独的盒子可以将任何表面变成虚拟触控板。

title: Bird flu kills thousands of sea birds, marine animals in Peru
titleCN: 秘鲁发生禽流感，数千只海鸟和海洋动物死亡

paragraphs.original: Scientists do not rule out transmission of potentially deadly virus to humans
paragraphs.translation: 科学家不排除这种潜在致命病毒会传染给人类

paragraphs.original: An outbreak of *bird flu*(禽流感) is causing significant losses in several species of *wildlife*(野生动物) in Peru.
paragraphs.translation: 秘鲁爆发的禽流感已导致多种野生动物数量锐减。

paragraphs.original: The *H5N1 strain*(H5N1型禽流感病毒) has killed thousands of *sea lions*(海狮) and *pelicans*(鹈鹕) in *protected areas*(保护区) across the country, authorities said.
paragraphs.translation: 有关部门表示，H5N1型禽流感病毒已在全国多个保护区导致数千只海狮和鹈鹕死亡。

paragraphs.original: On Jan. 27, a hundred dead sea lions were found floating in the waters of Isla Asia, about 60 miles (96 kilometers) south of the capital Lima. Some 716 sea lions have been found dead on various beaches around the country.
paragraphs.translation: 1月27日，在首都利马以南约60英里（96公里）的亚洲岛海域发现了一百只死亡的海狮。全国各海滩已发现约716只死亡的海狮。

paragraphs.original: Since November, the virus has killed 63,000 birds, according to government data.
paragraphs.translation: 据政府数据显示，自去年11月以来，该病毒已导致6.3万只鸟类死亡。

paragraphs.original: Peru's agricultural health agency has reported that the disease may be transmitted by *migratory birds*(候鸟) from North America.
paragraphs.translation: 秘鲁农业健康机构报告称，这种疾病可能是由来自北美的候鸟传播的。

paragraphs.original: Authorities are worried as some of the species that are becoming infected are already considered *endangered*(濒危物种) in the country.
paragraphs.translation: 令有关部门担忧的是，部分感染该病毒的物种在秘鲁已被列为濒危物种。

paragraphs.original: In Peru, there are indications that the disease is spreading among *mammals*(哺乳动物) of different species.
paragraphs.translation: 在秘鲁，有迹象表明该疾病正在不同物种的哺乳动物之间传播。

paragraphs.original: Scientists fear that *close contact*(密切接触) between sea lions and humans increases the chances of the virus being *transmitted*(传播) to people.
paragraphs.translation: 科学家担心，海狮与人类的密切接触会增加病毒传播给人类的风险。

paragraphs.original: Peru's National Forest and Wildlife Service has urged people to avoid approaching sea lions and sea birds on the beach and to prevent their pets from doing so.
paragraphs.translation: 秘鲁国家森林和野生动物服务局已敦促人们避免在海滩上靠近海狮和海鸟，并防止宠物靠近它们。

paragraphs.original: In South America, bird flu cases have been detected in Ecuador, Bolivia, Chile, Paraguay and recently in Argentina and Uruguay, where a *sanitary emergency*(卫生紧急状态) has been declared.
paragraphs.translation: 在南美洲，厄瓜多尔、玻利维亚、智利、巴拉圭都已发现禽流感病例，最近阿根廷和乌拉圭也出现了病例，乌拉圭已宣布进入卫生紧急状态。

paragraphs.original: The director general of the *World Health Organization (WHO)*(世界卫生组织), Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesyus, said the virus has been spreading among *poultry*(家禽) and wild birds for 25 years, but recently infections have been detected in *minks*(水貂), *otters*(水獭) and sea lions, so "they should be closely monitored."
paragraphs.translation: 世界卫生组织（WHO）总干事谭德塞·阿达诺姆·格布雷耶苏斯表示，该病毒在家禽和野生鸟类中传播已有25年历史，但最近在水貂、水獭和海狮中也发现了感染病例，因此"应密切监测这些动物"。

paragraphs.original: Europe has experienced its *worst-ever outbreak*(有史以来最严重的疫情) of bird flu since 2021, while North and South America have recently been experiencing *severe outbreaks*(严重的疫情爆发).
paragraphs.translation: 自2021年以来，欧洲经历了有史以来最严重的禽流感疫情，而北美和南美最近也出现了严重的疫情爆发。

title: 3000-Year-Old City Hidden In Amazon Rainforest Discovered
titleCN: 亚马逊雨林中发现了一座有3000年历史的隐藏城市

paragraphs.original: A huge city hidden by the *luxuriant vegetation*(茂密植被) of the *Amazon rainforest*(亚马逊雨林) has been discovered in Ecuador. According to the BBC, the houses and plazas in the *ancient city*(古城) in Upano valley were connected by a network of *roads and canals*(道路和运河). The area lies in the shadow of a *volcano*(火山) that created rich local soils, the outlet further said. The discovery was made using *LiDar*(激光雷达), a popular *remote sensing*(遥感) method that uses light to measure distances and is also known as *laser scanning*(激光扫描) or 3D scanning.
paragraphs.translation: 在厄瓜多尔发现了一座被亚马逊雨林茂密植被所隐藏的巨大城市。据BBC报道，这座位于乌帕诺山谷的古城中的房屋和广场通过道路和运河网络相互连接。该地区位于一座火山的阴影之下，这座火山造就了当地肥沃的土壤。这一发现是通过LiDar技术完成的，这是一种流行的遥感方法，利用光来测量距离，也被称为激光扫描或3D扫描。

paragraphs.original: This is older than any other *site*(遗址) we know in the Amazon. We have a *Eurocentric*(以欧洲为中心的) view of *civilizations*(文明), but this shows we have to change our idea about what is *culture*(文化) and civilization, Professor Stephen Rostain, director of investigation at the national Centre for Scientific Research in France, who led the research, told the BBC.
paragraphs.translation: 法国国家科学研究中心调查主任斯蒂芬·罗斯坦教授是这项研究的负责人，他告诉BBC："这比我们在亚马逊已知的任何其他遗址都要古老。我们对文明的看法是以欧洲为中心的，但这表明我们必须改变对文化和文明的理解。"

paragraphs.original: It changes the way we see *Amazonian cultures*(亚马逊文化). Most people picture small groups, probably naked, living in *huts*(小屋) and *clearing land*(开垦土地) - this shows ancient people lived in *complicated urban societies*(复杂的城市社会), Antonine Dorison, a co-author of the study, said.
paragraphs.translation: 该研究的合著者安东尼·多里森表示："这改变了我们看待亚马逊文化的方式。大多数人想象的是小群体，可能赤身裸体，住在小屋里，开垦土地——但这表明古人生活在复杂的城市社会中。"

paragraphs.original: *New Scientist*(《新科学家》杂志) said the city is between 3,000 and 2,500 years old - older than other *pre-Columbian*(前哥伦布时期的) ones discovered in the Amazon. It also said that people lived there for *up to*(长达) 1,000 years.
paragraphs.translation: 《新科学家》杂志称，这座城市的历史在3000到2500年之间——比在亚马逊发现的其他前哥伦布时期的城市都要古老。该杂志还表示，人类在那里居住了长达1000年之久。

paragraphs.original: Though the Lidar *survey*(调查) was carried out in 2015, the results were published recently. It revealed more than 6,000 *raised earthen platforms*(凸起的土台) within an area of 300 square kilometers.
paragraphs.translation: 虽然LiDar调查是在2015年进行的，但结果最近才公布。它在300平方公里的区域内发现了6000多个凸起的土台。

paragraphs.original: The report said these are where wooden buildings once stood and *excavations*(挖掘工作) have revealed *post holes*(柱孔) and *fireplaces*(壁炉) on these *structures*(结构).
paragraphs.translation: 报告称，这些土台是曾经矗立木质建筑的地方，挖掘工作在这些结构上发现了柱孔和壁炉。

paragraphs.original: The research team said there were five major *settlements*(定居点) in the area surveyed. Talking about the *road network*(道路网络) there, the survey revealed the longest one extends for at least 25 kilometers.
paragraphs.translation: 研究小组表示，在调查的地区有五个主要的“定居点”。谈到那里的公路网，调查显示最长的公路网至少有25公里长。

title: Shanghai Disney's new attraction draws visitors
titleCN: 上海迪士尼新景点吸引游客

paragraphs.original: A performance marks the opening of Shanghai Disneyland's *Zootopia land*(疯狂动物城园区) on Tuesday.
paragraphs.translation: 周二，一场表演标志着上海迪士尼乐园疯狂动物城园区的开幕。

paragraphs.original: Shanghai Disneyland's highly anticipated *Zootopia land*(疯狂动物城园区) opened to the public on Wednesday, and is expected to attract visitors from home and abroad while adding sparkle to the recovery of the city's tourism industry, company executives and industry insiders said.
paragraphs.translation: 公司高管和业内人士表示，备受期待的上海迪士尼乐园疯狂动物城园区于周三正式对公众开放，预计将吸引国内外游客，为上海旅游业的复苏增添活力。

paragraphs.original: The new *themed land*(主题园区) and its attractions are based on the 2016 *animated film*(动画电影) Zootopia made by *Walt Disney Animation Studios*(华特迪士尼动画工作室). Construction work started in December 2019. Zootopia is the eighth themed land at Shanghai Disneyland, according to Shanghai Disney Resort.
paragraphs.translation: 这个新的主题园区及其景点基于华特迪士尼动画工作室2016年制作的动画电影《疯狂动物城》。上海迪士尼度假区表示，疯狂动物城是上海迪士尼乐园的第八个主题园区，建设工作于2019年12月启动。

paragraphs.original: Walt Disney Company's CEO Bob Iger said at the opening ceremony on Tuesday afternoon that Zootopia is Shanghai Disneyland's second *major expansion*(重大扩建) and demonstrates the company's *unwavering confidence*(坚定信心) in bringing the Disney experience to the Chinese market.
paragraphs.translation: 华特迪士尼公司首席执行官鲍勃·艾格在周二下午的开幕式上表示，疯狂动物城是上海迪士尼乐园的第二次重大扩建，展示了公司将迪士尼体验带给中国市场的坚定信心。

paragraphs.original: They chose Zootopia as the theme because of the animated movie's *enduring popularity*(经久不衰的受欢迎程度) among its Chinese fans, he said.
paragraphs.translation: 他说，他们选择《疯狂动物城》作为主题，是因为这部动画电影在中国粉丝中经久不衰的受欢迎程度。

paragraphs.original: The *buzz*(热度) about Zootopia land's opening is reflected in data from *online travel agencies*(在线旅行社). According to Trip.com Group, China's largest online travel agency, searches for Shanghai Disneyland-related products jumped nearly 20 percent on Monday compared with the previous week. *Tour packages*(旅游套餐) for Shanghai Disney Resort between Dec 21 and 23 were sold out on travel portal LY.com on Monday.
paragraphs.translation: 在线旅行社的数据反映了疯狂动物城园区开幕的热度。据中国最大的在线旅行社携程网数据显示，周一上海迪士尼乐园相关产品的搜索量较前一周增长了近20%。周一，旅游门户网站同程网上海迪士尼度假区12月21日至23日的旅游套餐已售罄。

paragraphs.original: Zootopia land has opened at a time when the *tourism sector*(旅游业) is seeing a rapid recovery from the *COVID-19 pandemic*(新冠疫情). Shanghai received nearly 2.3 million *inbound travelers*(入境游客) during the first three quarters of the year, while the number for the entire year is expected to exceed 3 million, according to the *Shanghai Municipal Administration of Culture and Tourism*(上海市文化和旅游局).
paragraphs.translation: 疯狂动物城园区开放之际，旅游业正从新冠疫情中迅速复苏。据上海市文化和旅游局数据显示，今年前三季度，上海接待入境游客近230万人次，全年预计将超过300万人次。

paragraphs.original: The figures also confirm Shanghai's role as the first stop in China for international tourists, said officials from the administration.
paragraphs.translation: 上海市文化和旅游局官员表示，这些数据也印证了上海作为国际游客在中国的第一站的地位。

paragraphs.original: Josh D'Amaro, chairman of Disney Experiences, said that Zootopia land will help Shanghai consolidate its role as a *major tourist destination*(主要旅游目的地) and attract more international visitors. Shanghai Disneyland expects to receive a record 13 million visitors in 2023, he added.
paragraphs.translation: 迪士尼体验部主席乔什·达马罗表示，疯狂动物城园区将帮助上海巩固其作为主要旅游目的地的地位，并吸引更多国际游客。他补充说，上海迪士尼乐园预计2023年将接待创纪录的1300万游客。

paragraphs.original: Jared Bush, *co-writer and co-director*(联合编剧兼联合导演) of the animated movie Zootopia, visited the new themed land on Monday. He disclosed some of the character and places featured in the attractions and teased some of the details of the next Zootopia movie, which his team is currently working on.
paragraphs.translation: 《疯狂动物城》动画电影的联合编剧兼联合导演贾里德·布什周一参观了这个新的主题园区。他透露了景点中的一些角色和地点，并透露了他的团队目前正在制作的下一部《疯狂动物城》电影的一些细节。

paragraphs.original: Jill Estorino, president and managing director of Disney Parks International, said Zootopia has the biggest *box office takings*(票房收入) of all *imported animated movies*(进口动画电影) in China, which is one of the major reasons for making it the new themed land at the park.
paragraphs.translation: 迪士尼乐园国际部总裁兼总经理吉尔·埃斯托里诺表示，《疯狂动物城》是中国所有进口动画电影中票房最高的，这是将其打造成园区新主题的主要原因之一。

paragraphs.original: Zootopia *reaped*(收获) 1.53 billion yuan ($210 million) in China, according to entertainment services platform Maoyan.
paragraphs.translation: 据娱乐服务平台猫眼数据显示，《疯狂动物城》在中国收获了15.3亿元（约合2.1亿美元）的票房。

paragraphs.original: Shanghai Disneyland warned that the ride Zootopia: Hot Pursuit - an *all-terrain cruiser*(全地形巡洋舰) powered by a *trackless ride system*(无轨道骑乘系统) - may not be available to all visitors due to the anticipated high demand and the resort's *maximum capacity*(最大容量).
paragraphs.translation: 上海迪士尼乐园警告称，由于预期的高需求和度假区的最大容量，“疯狂动物城：热追” 一款由无轨骑行系统驱动的全地形巡弋船——可能不会对所有游客开放。

title: William Shakespeare Statue in Budapest
titleCN: 布达佩斯的威廉·莎士比亚雕像

paragraphs.original: How did an Australian statue of the *Bard of Avon*(埃文河畔诗人) end up in *Hungary*(匈牙利)?
paragraphs.translation: 一尊来自澳大利亚的埃文河畔诗人雕像怎么会出现在匈牙利？

paragraphs.original: William Shakespeare is an *iconic figure*(标志性人物) that can be easily recognized anywhere, even in Budapest. In a *plaza*(广场) on the *Danubian riverside*(多瑙河畔), he is depicted in his typical *Elizabethan garb*(伊丽莎白时期服装), as an actor *taking a bow*(鞠躬谢幕) on stage.
paragraphs.translation: 威廉·莎士比亚是一位在任何地方都能轻易认出的标志性人物，即使在布达佩斯也是如此。在多瑙河畔的一个广场上，他被描绘成穿着典型伊丽莎白时期服装的演员，在舞台上鞠躬谢幕。

paragraphs.original: According to the *inscription*(铭文) on the sculpture's platform, the original *piece*(作品) was created in 1960 by a *renowned*(著名的) *Hungarian-born Australian sculptor*(匈牙利出生的澳大利亚雕塑家), Andor Meszaros, for the city of Ballarat, Victoria. Perhaps surprisingly, it's not the only connection that this city has to Hungary, as the first *Hungarian gold medalists*(匈牙利金牌得主) during the 1956 Melbourne Olympic Games were won for *canoeing*(皮划艇) there by Janos Uranyi and Lazlo Fabian.
paragraphs.translation: 根据雕像基座上的铭文，原始作品是由匈牙利出生的澳大利亚著名雕塑家安多尔·梅萨罗斯于1960年为维多利亚州巴拉瑞特市创作的。或许令人惊讶的是，这座城市与匈牙利的联系不止于此——1956年墨尔本奥运会上，匈牙利的首枚金牌是由亚诺斯·乌拉尼和拉兹洛·法比安在那里的皮划艇比赛中获得的。

paragraphs.original: Following his trip to Australia in 1998, a *Hungarian attorney*(匈牙利律师) and Shakespeare fan Dr. Karoly Nagy thought of installing a Shakespeare statue in Budapest and started *raising funds*(筹集资金) for the project. In 2002, the city of Ballarat gave him approval to make a *replica*(复制品) of the statue, and the *casting*(铸造) was done in Hungary.
paragraphs.translation: 1998年访问澳大利亚后，匈牙利律师兼莎士比亚粉丝卡罗利·纳吉博士想到要在布达佩斯安装一尊莎士比亚雕像，并开始为该项目筹集资金。2002年，巴拉瑞特市批准他制作雕像的复制品，铸造工作在匈牙利完成。

paragraphs.original: On April 23 next year, the 439th anniversary of Shakespeare's birth (and the 387th anniversary of his death), the statue was *unveiled*(揭幕) beside Vigado Square, a *monument*(纪念碑) to the relations between Hungary and Australia.
paragraphs.translation: 明年4月23日，即莎士比亚诞辰439周年（也是他逝世387周年），这座雕像在维加多广场旁揭幕，成为匈牙利和澳大利亚关系的纪念碑。
